bibl.title: Beni Hassan el-Qadim: A Christian Village in Middle Egypt.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.author: JONES, Michael

bibl.note: Surface reconnaissance (architectural remains, pottery). The most concentrated occupation was probably during the middle of the first millennium AD.
JONES Michael, Beni Hassan el-Qadim: A Christian Village in Middle Egypt.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 163-172, 3 figg., pll. XXVII-XXVIII.
